snippet: During the nine-week holiday period in November and December, same-store sales rose 3.1 percent.
abstract: J C Penney stock plunges more than 10 percent despite news that same-store sales rose 2 percent during November-January quarter.
lead_paragraph: During the nine-week holiday period in November and December, same-store sales rose 3.1 percent.

headline.main: Holiday Sales Rise at J.C. Penney, but Stock Falls
headline.print_headline: Holiday Sales Rise at J.C. Penney, but Stock Falls
